name: Timestamp Period Adder Processor
description: Adds (or substracts) a certain amount of time to a timefield.

parameters.name: time_field
parameters.description: The field containing the timestamp to be modified.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: If the timefield is a String, the formatting for this String.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: If the timefield is a String, the locale for this String.

parameters.name: years
parameters.description: Adds this amount of years to the timestamp.

parameters.name: months
parameters.description: Adds this amount of months to the timestamp.

parameters.name: weeks
parameters.description: Adds this amount of weeks to the timestamp.

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: Adds this amount of days to the timestamp.

parameters.name: hours
parameters.description: Adds this amount of hours to the timestamp.

parameters.name: minutes
parameters.description: Adds this amount of minutes to the timestamp.

parameters.name: seconds
parameters.description: Adds this amount of seconds to the timestamp.
